data.text: @ottocrat Hopefully, I would imagine there are “back channels” for Tory donors…
@ItRecks Yes and presumably (hopefully) to make it easier for ordinary Russians to get out.
@ottocrat In this instance I believe it is due to recent Foreign Office advice to UK nationals to leave Russia.

@ottocrat I assume the Tories are granting UK asylum to Russian oligarchs?

Bet they won't even be asked if they can pick fruit.
